CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, May 19, 1945, pg. 13, reads: "A Ball in the Making!  Co-eds on Pitt campus, members of the Ivy Leaf Club of Iota AKA Chapter, are taking time out from studies to plan for their first formal, to be held at Aragon Ballroom May 30.  In the session are, left to right: Olivia King, Ernestine Parks, Mary Jane Mitchell and Susan Fowler.  The girls promise an evening of entertainment such as Smoky City hasn't seen for a long time.  Colorful decorations, sweet music and refreshments galore are on the menu. - Courier photo by Harris."
TitMainTitle: AKA sorority members Olivia King (Holt) and Susan Fowler in front, with Ernestine Parks and Mary Jane Mitchell (Page) in back, seated on steps on University of Pittsburgh Campus
